titleStmt.title: Vedānta Deśika's minor works and other commentaries

repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This big bundle contains 15 works that can be classified into two broad types : on the one hand, Nālāyira Divyaprabandham or related works (3), and on the other, Vedānta Deśika's minor theological works (12).

msItem.title: Tiruppāvai
msItem.author: Āṇṭāḷ
msItem.rubric: śrīmadśrīveṅkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ - śrīmatyai godāyai namaḥ -
msItem.incipit:
nīḷātuṅgastanagiritaṭīsuptam udbodhya kṛṣṇam pārārthyaṃ tvaṃ śrutiśataśi-ssiddhamadhyāpayantī-
ciṣṭāyāṃ srajinigaḷitaṃ yā balātkṛtya bhuṅkte godā tasyai nama idamidam bhūya evāstu bhūyaḥ - aṉṉavayal

msItem.title: Munivāhanabhogaḥ
msItem.author: Vedānta Deśikaṉ

filiation.p: It's a theological text by a Vaṭakalai Śrīvaiṣṇava Ācārya.

msItem.rubric:
śrīmate śrīnivāsa saṃyamimdra mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate gopālāryyamahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate nigamāntagurave namaḥ śrīraṅganāyakyai namaḥ śrīraṅganāthaparabrahmaṇe - - -
śrīmānveṅkaṭanāthāryaḥ kavitārkika kesarī - vedāntācāryavaryo me sannidhattāṃ sadā hṛdi -
msItem.incipit: praṇatiṃ veṃkaṭeśasya padayor padadhīmahi - yadukyayor pati…
msItem.colophon:
kavitārkika simhāya kalyāṇaguṇaśāline śrīmate veṅkaṭeśāya vedāntagurave namaḥ - śrīmadvedāntagurave namaḥ śrī macchrīveṃkaṭā
ryamahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate śrīnivāsa mahādeśikāya namaḥ - śrīmategopālārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīraṅganāyikāsameta śrīraṅga
nāthaparabrahmaṇe śrī alamelumaṅgasameta śrī śrīnivāsaparabrahmaṇe namaḥ உ

msItem.title: Tiruppāvai with a gloss
msItem.author: Āṇṭāḷ and unknown
msItem.incipit: goṣpadam neddhāradyutimān ṣaceṣṭayā eṣannārāyaṇa śrīmān kṣīrārṇava niketanaḥ
msItem.colophon:
śrīkṛṣṇapādamiśre
ṇa godāsūktyāḥ kṛtāṃ purā. vyākhyāñcadavāmayedānīṃ gīrvāṇena kṛtāmudā. iti tiruppāvai vyākhyā samāptā உ hariḥ om உ
śrīmatyai godāyai namaḥ - śrī macchrīveṃkaṭāryamahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate śrīnivāsa saṃyamisārvabhaumāya namaḥ - śrīmategopāladeśikamahā
gurave namaḥ śrībhūminīḷā sa śrīraṅganāyikāsameta śrīraṅganāthaparabrahmaṇe namaḥ śrībhūminīḷā alamelumaṅgasameta śrī śrīnivāsaparabrahmaṇe namaḥ śubhamastu ——
mānmathe vṛścike śukle caikādaśyāṃ vidhośri?ne | godoktiṭīkāṃ sulabhām vyalikhan narakesarī śrīmadvedāntarāmānujasaṃyamisārvabhauma mahādeśikāya namaḥ

msItem.title: Tiruppaḷḷieḻucci vyākhyānam
msItem.author: Toṇṭaraṭippoṭi Āḻvār and Nañcīyar

filiation.p: This is a Manipravala text by a Śrīvaiṣṇava Ācārya (ca 13th century).

msItem.rubric:
śrīmacchrīveṃkaṭāryamahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate śrīnivāsa saṃyamisārvabhaumāya namaḥ śrīmate gopālāryyamahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate nigamāntagurave namaḥ -
śrīraṅganāyakyai namaḥ śrīraṅganāthaparabrahmaṇe namaḥ - om -
msItem.incipit:
anādimāyayā supto yadā jīvaḥ prabudhyate eṉkiṟapaṭiye anādikālamajñānattālē yā(sic)ṟaṅkukiṟa ivaraip pe
riya perumāḷ tammoṭaiya niravi(sic)dhikakṛpaiyālē yuṇarttiyaruḷa vuṇarntu…
msItem.explicit: śeṣatvattiṉuṭaiya vellaiyile neṟittiṉa devar aṭiyēṉukkākat tiruppaḷḷiyuṇarntaruḷi aṭimai koṇṭaruḷaveṇumeṉakiṟār உ 10 உ
msItem.colophon:
hariḥ om śubhamastu toṇṭaṟaṭipoṭiyāḻavār tiruvaṭikaḷē caṟaṇam. śrīmacchrīveṃkaṭāryamahādeśikāya namaḥ - śrīmate śrīnivāsa mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate gopā
lāryyamahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīraṅganāyikāsameta śrīraṅganāthaparabrahmaṇe namaḥ உ tiruppaḷḷiyaḻicci vyākhyā samāptā உ

msItem.title: Pradhānaśatakaṃ
msItem.author: Vedānta Deśikaṉ

filiation.p: This is one of the minor theological works by an eminent "Vaṭakalai" Śrīvaiṣṇava Ācārya.

msItem.rubric:
śrīmacchrīveṃkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ - śrīmate śrīnivāsa mahādeśikāya namaḥ - śrīmate gopālāryyamahādeśikāya namaḥ - śrīmate nigamānta mahādeśikāya namaḥ - śrīraṅganāthapara
brahmaṇe namaḥ - om உ śrīmānveṅkaṭanāthāryaḥ kavitārkika kesarī - vedāntācāryavaryo me sannidhattāṃ sadā hṛdi -
msItem.incipit: paravidupadarśitaṃ naḥ pradhānaśatakaṃ pramāṇasiddhamidam - bhajati śatakoṭibhāvaṃ parapakṣe ca prayojane ca stāṃ . poṅku puṉal āṟukaḷilp puvaṉam ellām…
msItem.explicit:
vāciyaṟintavai vaiyuraittom vaiyyattuḷḷir vaippākavivai
koṇtu makiḻmiṉirē உ
msItem.finalRubric:
śrīmadveṅkatanāthassahṛdayahṛdayaprasādanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ - vyaktaṃ pradhānaśatakaṃ vyatan?ta kavikathakakatighaṭāsinmuh? -
iti kavitārkikasimhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthasya śrīmadvedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu pradhānaśatakaṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ
msItem.colophon:
kavitārkikasimhāya+ vedā
ntagurave namaḥ உ hari om śrīmacśrīveṃkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ உ śrīrastu

msItem.title: Śrīhastigirimāhātmyaṃ
msItem.author: Vedānta Deśikaṉ

filiation.p: This is one of the minor theological works by an eminent "Vaṭakalai" Śrīvaiṣṇava Ācārya.

msItem.rubric:
śrīmacśrīveṃkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate śrīnivāsa saṃyamisārvabhaumāya namaḥ śrīmate gopālāryyamahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate nigamāntagurave namaḥ - śrīmānveṅkaṭanāthāryaḥ ka
vitārkika kesarī - vedāntācāryavaryo me sannidhattāṃ sadā hṛdi -
msItem.explicit:
kai koḷ kaṉi pōl nilam kaṇṭu - kavikathaka pantuvaktrastraiyyanta gurustriloka mahanīyam satyavrata mā
hātmyaṃ vyatanuta laḷitamiti v[eṅkaṭe]śaguruḥ -
msItem.finalRubric: hariḥ om - iti kavitārkikasimhasya +vedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu satyavratamāhātmyaṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ உ
msItem.colophon:
śrīraṅganāyakyai namaḥ -
kavitārkikasimhāya + vedāntagurave namaḥ śrīmate nigamānta gurave namaḥ śrīmacśrīveṃkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate śrīnivāsa mahādeśikāya namaḥ -

msItem.title: rahasyaśikhāmaṇiḥ
msItem.author: Vedānta Deśikaṉ

filiation.p: This is one of the minor theological works by an eminent "Vaṭakalai" Śrīvaiṣṇava Ācārya.

msItem.rubric:
śrīmacchrīveṃkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate śrīnivāsa mahāgurave namaḥ śrīmate gopālāryyamahādeśikāya namaḥ - śrīmānveṅkaṭanāthāryaḥ kavitārkika kesarī - vedāntācāryavaryo
me sannidhattāṃ sadā hṛdi -
msItem.incipit:
om sthiracarajaganmātuḥ kṣoṇyāḥ kvaciccaturarṇavī vīpadi sapadi kroḍakrīḍāṃ vibhāvayataḥ prabhoḥ | śrutiparipaṇaślokadvandvātmanā paripaktrimo
ramayatu manaḥ sattvasthānāṃ rahasyaśikhāmaṇiḥ - kvāpi kalpāntaveśante khuradaghne samuddhṛtām |vahate medinīmustāṃ mahate potriṇe namaḥ -
msItem.explicit: kāṣṭhapāṣāṇasannibhaṃ | ahaṃ smarāmi mat(sic) bhaktaṃ nayāti paramāṃ gatiṃ | உ
msItem.colophon:
imau varāha caramaślokaṃ உ
etat vyākhyā rahasyaśikhāmaṇiḥ

msItem.title: Upakārasaṃgrahaḥ
msItem.author: Vedānta Deśikaṉ

filiation.p: This is one of the minor theological works by an eminent "Vaṭakalai" Śrīvaiṣṇava Ācārya.

msItem.rubric: śrīmacśrīveṃkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ - śrīmānveṅkaṭanāthāryaḥ kavitārkika kesarī - vedāntācāryavaryo me sannidhattāṃ sadā hṛdi - śrīmate nigamānta gurave namaḥ
msItem.incipit: antamillā pēriṉpa māri arintavērkum aṭiyoṭamai yarivuṭaṉe yeṉṟu
msItem.explicit:
cuḻiyāta cevvaḻiyil to(sic)ṇaivarōṭē tu(sic)laiyāta
periṉpam mēl ētti aṟuḷāta aruḷāḻip perumāḷ ceyyumantamillāp pataviyellāmaḷappārārē -
msItem.finalRubric:
iti kavitārkika simhasya sarvatantra
svatantrasya śrī madveṅkaṭanāthasya atiṣṭha upakārasaṃgrahe tritīyodhikāraḥ
msItem.colophon:
hariḥ om upakārasaṃgrahasaṃpūrṇaḥ śrīrastu
kavitārkika simhāya kalyāṇaguṇaśāline śrīmate veṅkaṭeśāya vedāntagurave namaḥ śrīmacśrīveṃkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ
śrīmate śrīnivāsa mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate gopālāryamahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate devaśikhāmaṇi tātārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ -
śrīmate nigamānta gurave namaḥ śrī śrīdharāsyarannamaḥ śrī alamelumaṅgasameta śrīnivāsaparabrahmaṇe namaḥ

msItem.title: Tattvasandeśaḥ
msItem.author: Vedānta Deśikaṉ

filiation.p: This is one of the minor theological works by an eminent "Vaṭakalai" Śrīvaiṣṇava Ācārya.

msItem.rubric:
śrīmacchrīveṃkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate śrīnivāsa mahādeśīkāya namaḥ śrīmate gopālāryamahāgurave namaḥ śrīmate nigamānta gurave namaḥ - śrīmānveṅkaṭanāthāryaḥ kavitā
rkika kesarī - vedāntācāryavaryo me sannidhattāṃ sadā hṛdi
msItem.explicit: nitye śeṣiṇi nikṣipannijabharaṃ sarvasahe śrīsakhe dharma dhāraya cātakasya kuśalin dhārādharaikāntinaḥ
msItem.finalRubric:
iti kavitārki
kasimhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthasya śrīmadvedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu tatvasandeśassaṃpūrṇaḥ
msItem.colophon: avitārkika simhāya + vedāntagurave namaḥ śrīmate nigamānta mahādeśikāya namaḥ

msItem.title: Rahasyasandeśaḥ
msItem.author: Vedānta Deśikaṉ

filiation.p: This is one of the minor theological works by an eminent "Vaṭakalai" Śrīvaiṣṇava Ācārya.

msItem.rubric:
śrī śrīdhatāsyam namaḥ
śrīmānveṅkaṭanāthāryaḥ kavitārkika kesarī - vedāntācāryavaryo me sannidhattāṃ sadā hṛdi - உ
msItem.incipit: yāṉaṟiyuṅcuṭarākiṉiṉṟeṉ mattumayātumallēṉ - vāṉamarun tirumālaṭiyeṉ mattor pattumileṉ -
msItem.explicit: meliṅku nām piṟavom velaivaṇṇaṉai mevutume | śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthena śiṣyāṇāṃ hitamicchatā | itthaṃ rahasyasārārthaḥ saṅgṛhya samadarśyata ||
msItem.colophon:
iti kavitārki
kasimhasya + śrīmadvedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu rahasyasandeśaḥ saṃpūrṇaḥ hariḥ om kavitārkika simhāya + vedāntagurave namaḥ

msItem.rubric: śrīmacchrīveṃkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmānveṅkaṭanāthāryaḥ kavitārkika kesarī - vedāntācāryavaryo me sannidhattāṃ sadā hṛdi - śrīmate vedāntagurave namaḥ -

msItem.colophon:
iti kavitārkikasimhasya +
śrīmadvedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu rahasyasandeśavivaraṇaṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ | hariḥ om உ kavitārkikasimhāya + vedāntagurave namaḥ

msItem.title: Tattvaratnāvalī
msItem.author: Vedānta Deśikaṉ

filiation.p: This is one of the minor theological works by an eminent "Vaṭakalai" Śrīvaiṣṇava Ācārya.

msItem.rubric: śrīmacchrīveṃkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmānveṅkaṭanāthāryaḥ kavitārkika kesarī - vedāntācāryavaryo me sannidhattāṃ sadā hṛdi - śrīmate vedāntagurave namaḥ உ śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ |
msItem.incipit: vaṇmaiyukanta varuḷāl vaṟantaru mātavaṉār uṇmai yuṇarntavar otivikkiṉṟa vuraivaḻiyē…

mānatassaṃmitatvepi maha

msItem.finalRubric: iti kavitārkikasimhasya + śrīmadvedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu tatvaratnāvalī saṃpūrṇaṃ உ

msItem.rubric: śrīmacchrīveṃkaṭārya mahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmānveṅkaṭanāthāryaḥ kavitārkika kesarī - vedāntācāryavaryo me sannidhattāṃ sadā hṛdi - śrīmate nigamāntadeśikāya namaḥ உ śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ |

iti kavitārkikasimhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthasya

extent.measure: 1 guard folio, 2 unnumbered folios (one with a kind of table of contents, and the second with Telugu writing). Foliation mostly begins whenever one of the 16 texts of this bundle begins (but not systematically for closely related texts). T1: 5 folios T2: 14 folios T3: 20 folios T4: 5 folios (double foliation, one in continuation with the work above, and one, new for this one) T5: 7 folios T6: 1 folio T7: 8 folios T8: 10 folios T9: 10 folios T10: 3 folios (foliation continues with all following works) T11: 2 folios T12: 2 folios T13: 2 folios T14: 1 folio T15: 2 folios T16: 1 folio T17: 2 folios A couple of leaves are found at the end, listing few works byVedānta Deśika and the number of verses found in them.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter-numerals, left margin, often the foliation begins anew for his major work.

supportDesc.condition: In general, the bundle is well-preserved, except for certain leaves that contain both stains and broken edges.

handNote.desc: Legible, although perhaps not that of a professional. Harder to read the folios that are not inked.
